title: What Type of Traveler Are You?

options.text: Exploring new cultures
Seeking adventure and thrills
Relaxing and unwinding
Learning and gaining knowledge

questions.question: What is your ideal travel companion?

options.text: A close friend who shares my interests
A fellow adventurer ready for anything
My partner for a romantic getaway
Someone who loves to discuss ideas and history

questions.question: How do you prefer to plan your trips?

options.text: I love researching and planning every detail
I prefer to go with the flow and be spontaneous
I like to book a nice hotel and relax
I enjoy learning about the destination beforehand

questions.question: What type of accommodation do you prefer?

options.text: A local homestay or boutique hotel
Camping or staying in hostels
A luxurious resort or spa
A historic or educational place to stay

questions.question: What is your favorite travel activity?

options.text: Visiting museums and cultural sites
Hiking, climbing, or extreme sports
Sunbathing by the beach or pool
Attending lectures, workshops, or tours

questions.question: How do you feel about trying local cuisine?

options.text: I love trying new dishes and flavors
Iâ€™ll try anything once for the experience
I prefer familiar foods, especially when relaxing
I enjoy learning the history behind local dishes

questions.question: What souvenir do you like to bring back?

options.text: Art or crafts made by local artisans
A photo or story from my adventure
Spa products or relaxation items
Books or educational materials about the place

questions.question: How do you feel when you return home from a trip?

options.text: Inspired to continue exploring new cultures
Eager to plan my next adventure
Refreshed and ready to relax at home
Motivated to share what I've learned with others

result_logic.Cultural Explorer: You love immersing yourself in new cultures and experiences!
result_logic.Adventure Seeker: You live for the thrill of adventure and the excitement of new challenges!
result_logic.Relaxation Enthusiast: You prioritize relaxation and comfort, seeking peace during your travels.
result_logic.Knowledge Seeker: You travel to learn, explore ideas, and expand your understanding of the world.
